name: Pixel Arena (photodenshi)
description:
This is a single player 2D arena game. The objective of the game is to survive as long possible. 

Controls

Move: WASD and Arrow Keys

Attack: Space

Interact: X (open the door)

Keep Orientation : Shift

Future Plans

Currently, the only weapon is the Katana. In the future I plan to add a lot more weapons. This would be done by adding a shop and inventory.  My plans are to make the enemies to drop coins. This would be used in the shop to buy new weapons. A healing system will also be introduced using the shop. The idea will be to choose between better weapons or healing.

I also intend to add more enemies. Currently, the waves scale by linearly increasing the number of skeletons  that spawn. However, this is dumb and boring. Therefore, I intend to add a greater variety of enemies and make the wave system better.

The map will also be expanded. However as this is meant to be an arena game I don't have plans to make a dungeon map.
